PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-08222022-06-24,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HC
ActPatent Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Regulations Amending the Patented Medicines Regulations (Additional Factors and Information Reporting Requirements), No. 5
PrecisRegulations Amending the REGULATIONS AMENDING THE PATENTED MEDICINES REGULATIONS (ADDITIONAL FACTORS AND INFORMATION REPORTING REQUIREMENTS), No. 5 in order to repeal the provisions of the regulations that would (1) provide the additional price regulatory factors and the information that rights holders are required to report to the Patented Medicine Prices Review Board (PMPRB) that is relevant to the new factors of pharmacoeconomic value and market size, and (2) allow the PMPRB to collect the price information that is net of third party rebates.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0162 Publication Date: 2022-07-06
AttachmentsAttachment
